patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+function dxdt = plant(t,x,sys,ctrl)
+    
+    
+    [J] = UpdateJacobian(x);
+    W = ctrl.u(t,x(1:6),ctrl.p(x(1:6),x(7:12)))
+    [ctrl.T,W]=TensionDistribution(J,W);
+    
+      
+    dxdt =  sys.dx(x(1:6),x(7:12),W,t);%Define ODE
+
+
+

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+function dxdt = plant(t,x,sys,ctrl)
+    
+    
+    [J] = UpdateJacobian(x);
+    u = ctrl.u(t,x(1:6),ctrl.p(x(1:6),x(7:12)));
+    [ctrl.T,W]=TensionDistribution(J,u);
+    T=ctrl.T
+    error = u-W
+      
+    dxdt =  sys.dx(x(1:6),x(7:12),W,t);%Define ODE
+
+
+

@@ -20,10 +20,9 @@
     if ctrl.selector ==1
      u = ctrl.u(k4,t,q,ctrl.p(q,p));
 
       else
- u = ctrl.u(t,q,ctrl.p(q,p));
-      end
+     end
      % CESO State Update
       z_hat1 = [sys.Hdq(q_hat1,p_hat1); sys.Hdp(q_hat1,p_hat1); distur_hat1];     % First Layer ESO State
       z_hat2 = [sys.Hdq(q_hat2,p_hat2); sys.Hdp(q_hat2,p_hat2); distur_hat2];     % Second Layer ESO State
       z_hat3 = [sys.Hdq(q_hat3,p_hat3); sys.Hdp(q_hat3,p_hat3); distur_hat3];     % third Layer ESO State

       else

      end
      % CESO State Update
